#summary Checking out a single guest from a group booking.

== Process ==

  # Click Bookings
  # For Date (from) and Date (to) select today's date.
  # Under "Match Dates By", select Check-Out Date.
  # Keep name blank (for all) or enter the name of the person checking out.
  # Click Search.
  # Click on the "Edit" icon of the matching booking to checkout.
  # Under the correct _allocation_ click the 'Exit' icon next to today's date. 
  # Click save.
